page.title: 10Trade
page.content:
{BOLSOVER TOWN CENTRE SHOPPING SURVEY
We spent part of an afternoon conducting a shopping survey in Bolsover Town Centre. Five different questions were asked and the replies noted. In the classroom the final totals were converted into percentages to indicate the most important answers to our questions.
{1. Where do you live? Bolsover {56% }Hillstown {12% Shuttlewood {6% }Carr Vale {6% Glapwell {2% }Duckmanton {2% New Bolsover {2% }Others {14%
{86%}of those questioned lived within a {4km radius;}the remainder came from other parts of Derbyshire, South and West Yorkshire, Birmingham and Manchester.
